pr_title: HDDS-3701. Change Close container exception logging to debug in ContainerUtils#logAndReturnError

timeline.bodyHTML:
Nit: Adding isDebugEnabled() check would let us avoid some unnecessary operations.

Suggested change
log.debug(logInfo, request.getCmdType(), request.getTraceID(),
ex.getMessage(), ex.getResult().getValueDescriptor().getName(), ex);
if (log.isDebugEnabled()) {
log.debug(logInfo, request.getCmdType(), request.getTraceID(),
ex.getMessage(), ex.getResult().getValueDescriptor().getName(), ex);
}
timeline.author: adoroszlai

timeline.body: Its better to add debug for CONTAINER_NOT_OPEN as well.
timeline.bodyText: Its better to add debug for CONTAINER_NOT_OPEN as well.
timeline.bodyHTML: Its better to add debug for CONTAINER_NOT_OPEN as well.
timeline.author: bshashikant

replies.bodyText: Thanks @bshashikant for comment, I have update it.
